name: Better Work
description:
A group of colleagues come together for a full week of shared dinners - not entirely of their own volition. They try to make the best of it. 

Psalm 15: Better Work is a visual novel made for AdvXJam 2020. The theme of the jam was 'A Good Time', which of course immediately prompted the idea of a game about dinner with your coworkers. 

Psalms is an anthology of short digital fiction. Some entries are games, others are visual novels. And some - well, you'll see. Check in for new psalms every quarter.
